import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBInput, MDBBtn, MDBCheckbox, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBValidationItem, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; export default function App() { const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ fname: "Mark", lname: "Otto", email: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", }); const onChange = (e) => { setFormValue({ ...formValue, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (
@
Please choose a username.
 Submit form ); }
